reviewText: I haven't any issues with the pbs thing playing. It jumps right in.If you put this into your computer you have some CD-ROM aspects too like coloring pages and games.You can play any episode first and it will play that and the subsequent episodes in order.I have a screamer. He sits for this. I am a happy mom.P.S. The Canadian way people in the video never say "yes" they say "ya". I'm American it's a bit annoying to me to hear my two-year-old yelling YA!
Title: Caillou: Caillou, The Everyday Hero

reviewText: The new Caillou dvds are a little different from what we're used to.  They don't have the puppets in between the segments.  They are still great and the kids don't seem to mind.
Title: Caillou: Caillou, The Everyday Hero

reviewText: If your child likes Cailou, he'll love this dvd. After reading all the reviews, I chose this over others since my 3 y/o has only seen the PBS shows without the puppet(s) mentioned. Since my little boy is all about heroes and firefighters, he has really enjoyed this.
Title: Caillou: Caillou, The Everyday Hero

reviewText: My son is 2 and this is the only show to hold his attention so I buy the DVD's whenever I find a deal.  Another plus is there are no puppets in between the episodes.
Title: Caillou: Caillou, The Everyday Hero

reviewText: The grandchildren love watching this when we are driving around in the car. Makes long or short trips a breeze.
Title: Caillou: Caillou, The Everyday Hero

reviewText: My grandson watches this character more than any on tv.  Luckly, he isn't watching tv all day, but when he does, it is Calliou.  Wonderful program with very good lessons, my grandson wants to follow everything Calliou does, what a fantastic learning tool, move over Barney and Seasame Street.
Title: Caillou: Caillou, The Everyday Hero
